title: Voxiversity: Thucydides section one
author: VD
content_html:
First, close your book and test your knowledge of the first 115 chapters. You’ve got five minutes, so don’t start it and then walk away. Then let us know how you did and share your thoughts on the first section; I’ll post mine later in the day. I recommend taking the quiz before reading the comments.

Next week’s reading is from 1.116 to 2.46, page 118. Ebook readers, stop when you get to the summer of the second year and the onset of the plague in Athens, where it says: “Such was the funeral that took place during this winter.”
content_text:
First, close your book and
test your knowledge
of the first 115 chapters.  You’ve got five minutes, so don’t start it and then walk away.  Then let us know how you did and share your thoughts on the first section; I’ll post mine later in the day.  I recommend taking the quiz before reading the comments.
Next week’s reading is from 1.116 to 2.46, page 118.  Ebook readers, stop when you get to the summer of the second year and the onset of the plague in Athens, where it says: “Such was the funeral that took place during this winter.”
